title: Solana Smart Contract Vulnerabilities
description: A comprehensive collection of common security vulnerabilities in Solana smart contracts, with examples and mitigation strategies.

vulnerabilities.title: Account Data Matching
vulnerabilities.description: Failure to check that account data matches expected values

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Ownership Check
vulnerabilities.description: Failure to verify account ownership before processing

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Signer Check
vulnerabilities.description: Failure to verify transaction signatures for authorization

vulnerabilities.title: Type Cosplay
vulnerabilities.description: Misrepresentation of account types during deserialization

vulnerabilities.title: Overflow and Underflow
vulnerabilities.description: Arithmetic operations exceeding data type limits

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Initialization
vulnerabilities.description: Improper account initialization or reinitialization checks

vulnerabilities.title: Seed Collisions
vulnerabilities.description: Different seed inputs generating the same PDA

vulnerabilities.title: Remaining Accounts
vulnerabilities.description: Improper validation of accounts in the remaining_accounts vector

vulnerabilities.title: Bump Seed Canonicalization
vulnerabilities.description: Using attacker-supplied bump seeds instead of canonical ones

vulnerabilities.title: Loss of Precision
vulnerabilities.description: Precision loss in mathematical operations affecting calculations

references.name: Helius: A Hitchhiker's Guide to Solana Program Security
